participant_abstract.sent: We had a more informal discussion of the design particulars.
Focusing mostly on the shape, color, and feel of the outer casing, we decided on a fruit or vegetable influenced shape, along with a bright color scheme (mostly yellow).
The material was chosen to be spongy and rubbery, pleasing to look at and fun to touch.
As for the electronics, we scrapped the display screen and chose a speech recognition interface, upon recommendation of our research and development division.

participant_decisions.sent: We chose to use a spongy, rubbery material.
The electronics were voted on: speech interface over display screen.

participant_problems.sent: We had a bit of trouble determining how to make the device visually appealing and fun to use, without making it too childish or undermining the technological sophistication of the device.
